results.pt3_description: After running hard for the past few sessions, market continued its uptrend today as well. It has been hitting new all-time high everyday and is inching towards new milestone of 19,000. Every sector has participated in todays uptrend except technology. Rupee appreciation against the dollar is the major cause behind all technology stocks.

results.pt3_description: Infosys Technologies has come out with its Q2 numbers. Retail business is up 27%, energy and utilities up 19%, and manufacturing is up 13% on a QoQ basis. Offshore revenues is up 2.9% while onsite revenues has seen an upside of 2.6%.
results.summ_link/_title: New deals at 3-4% higher prices: Infy

results.pt3_description: Infosys BPO has posted good numbers for Q2FY07. The business has reported revenues of USD 53 million and a profit of USD 10 million. North America business contributed 62.6% of revenues, while Europe contributed 27.4%.

results.pt3_description: Infosys Technologies has revealed its Q2FY08 results. While rupee has been the main spoil sport in the IT party, Infosys' management says the currecny appreciation does not bother it too much.

results.pt3_description: Infosys Technologies has announced its second quarter numbers. The company has posted just 1.9% growth in net profit at Rs 1100 crore in second quarter of FY08 as against Rs 1,079 crore in previous quarter of the same year.

results.pt3_description: It is Thursday morning. Infosys has come and gone but the market scene has not changed. Despite Infosys numbers, the markets are still in the range of 3,500-3,600 for the Nifty. The morning was euphoric yesterday but by afternoon, it fizzled out. The midcaps actually took a little bit on the chin yesterday.
